name: GROWING SUSPICION (HAW Game Jam 2022)
description:
This game was created by Zeruelia and Federico during HAW Game Jam 2022.
The theme was "Growing Things", we took it into the direction of a mysterious murder case around a gardener and his plants.
I hope you like it and we would love if you could give us a rating and/or comment! Thanks :)

Audio Credits:
Piano Song by: https://www.patreon.com/Erokia
